tooltip.leadage.diving_weight.summary:
§2Allows you to turn §aheavier§2
depending on how many Diving Weights you hold.

§2The more you hold, the heavier you'll get
up to§a %1$s §aDiving Weights§2.

§2Use it to sink faster, reduce your jumps
or gain better control of your movements
while using Diving Leggings.
tooltip.leadage.salt.summary:
§2Turns §aGrass into Dirt
§2and §aFarmland into Coarse Dirt§2
in a §a%1$s §2blocks radius.
§2When combined with §aany type of food,
§2make them §apoisoned with lead

When given a sword, they’ll be able
